entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with a few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
